= Installation =

You can download and run the [Source source code] for the emulator, or you can download a free packaged version of the application, called [http://goo.gl/OQvYv 8-bit-hits], from the Chrome Web Store.

First, go to the [http://goo.gl/OQvYv application page] in the Chrome Web Store and click the install button:

<img src="http://gwt-nes-port.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/ChromeWebstoreScreenshot.png" width="600px" />

You will then see the 8-bit-hits icon on your home screen:

<img src="http://gwt-nes-port.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/ChromeAppsScreenshot.png" width="600px" />
